0x00400000	addi	$a0, $0, 20
0x00400004	jal	0x0040001c
0x00400008	addi	$a0, $v0, 0
0x0040000c	addi	$v0, $0, 1
0x00400010	syscall
0x00400014	addi	$v0, $0, 10
0x00400018	syscall
0x0040001c	addi	$t0, $a0, 0
0x00400020	addi	$v0, $0, 0
0x00400024	beq	$t0, $0, 3
0x00400028	add	$v0, $v0, $t0
0x0040002c	addi	$t0, $t0, -1
0x00400030	j	0x00400024
0x00400034	jr	$ra
